item.title: IS590ADV - Spring 2019
item.description: This course covered topics that could broadly be described as “advanced,” including new platforms and tools for visualizing data, and how to present data in different, more thoughtful ways. It was structured differently than the other data viz courses, and designed for more interaction with a smaller group of students.

item.title: IS590DV - Fall 2018

item.title: IS590DV - Spring 2018
item.description: Starting in Spring 2018, I transitioned courses to using Github Pages and RevealJS. The repository includes built slide decks and rendered Jupyter notebooks.

item.title: LIS590DV - Fall 2017

item.title: LIS590DV - Spring 2017
item.description: This was the first time I taught Data Viz, and the course repository includes the original Google Slides PDFs, links to the presentations, and the notebooks used in the course.
